ingredients.ingredient: 1 French baguette, cut into 1/2 inch slices

cookingTips: Toast the baguette slices lightly for better structural support and a pleasant crunch
Toast the pecans lightly to bring out their natural oils and deepen the flavor
Assemble these just before serving to keep the bread from absorbing excess moisture from the cheese
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can you balance the creamy goat cheese, crunchy nuts, and fresh grapes for the best texture and flavor combination?
